event.title: Young Liberals
event.description: Joined the Young Liberals, engaging with policy discussions and community initiatives.

event.title: Pharmacy Assistant
event.description: Working as a Pharmacy Assistant since January 2024, gaining valuable experience in healthcare and customer service.

event.title: KFC
